title: Man Arrested At Airport With 30 Pounds of Heroin In His Anus
text:
The gentleman under custody is Christopher Nowkuvski, and he is being charged with drug possession, trafficking, and a several misdemeanor charges. The arresting officer claims he has never seen anything like this before, and said that he found it â€˜hilariousâ€™ that the culprit thought he could squeeze his way by security.
According to police reports, Nowkuvski had almost 30 pounds of heroin inserted in his anus, in what police are saying was a failed attempt to get it on the plane bound for Canada. Unfortunately for Nowkuvski, he didnâ€™t make it very far through security before being stopped and questioned.
â€œHe came into the airport sweating and limping, as if he was dying. We knew something was up from the get-go,â€ said Joe Goldsmith, a security guard for the airport. â€œI asked him if he needed medical help, and he nervously laughed, claiming he was fine and just needed to get on the plane. He began to walk towards his gate, and from behind I noticed little balloons begin to fall from the leg of his pants.â€
Once he was in custody, Nowkuvski claimed he had no idea how the drugs got into his anus. Officers at the scene gave him a full cavity search, which took nearly 3 full hours. The final bag was lodged so far inside him, that it was almost reaching his intestines.
â€œIt was insane, it wouldnâ€™t stop coming out. After 10 bags we were in awe to how he even got it up there, then once we began to get into the hundreds all bets were off,â€ said Goldsmith. â€œItâ€™s definitely one for the record books. If I hadnâ€™t seen it with my own eyes, I surely never would have believed it.â€
If convicted, Nowkuvski could face up to 30 years in prison for trafficking.

title: 10-Year-Old Girl Receives Breast Implants From Mexican Doctor
text:
Since that time, Burge has apparently changed her mind, recently allowing and paying for her daughter, who is now 10, to get breast implants. The pair had to fly to Mexico to find a doctor willing to perform the surgery on such a young child.
â€œPoppy kept bugging me to have it done,â€ said Burge. â€œSheâ€™d stomp her feet and throw a tantrum, and say things like â€˜Mommy, you had your first surgery at 7! Iâ€™m 10 now! I want my surgery!â€™ After awhile, I realized that she was right, and I had to give in.â€
Burge says that she did try many clinics in both the UK and the US first, and every doctor she spoke to turned her down flat. Some even threatened to inform child protective services.

Dr. Jose Rodriguez is a non-certified plastic surgeon who works out of his offices, which are actually just small rooms attached to his apartment, in Tijuana, Mexico.

Me, I donâ€™t have those things. I performed the surgery, and it went very, very well. Young girl, she has a great set of breasts now. She is going to be a beautiful woman, just like her mama.â€
Burgeâ€™s young daughter, Poppy, said that she loved the experience of the surgery, and cannot wait to have more of them.

I donâ€™t like my fingers, so I might have them shaved down, too. I also want to have my eyes dyed a different color and to have my lips puffed way out like Mommyâ€™s. I want to be beautiful.â€
â€œPlastic surgery is a multi-billion dollar industry throughout the world,â€ said Rodriguez. â€œIt makes people happy, makes them feel better about themselves. Whatâ€™s wrong with that?â€
Burge has reportedly gifted several other vouchers to Poppy over the last few birthdays and holidays, including a $12,000 voucher for liposuction and $15,000 forÂ various additional cosmetic surgery. These vouchers usually come as birthday gifts, at parties where Burge spends anywhere from $40,000 to $75,000 for Poppy and her friends.
â€œI like to make her happy. Everything I do is for my Poppy,â€ said Burge. â€œI can afford to do anything and everything to make her dreams come true, so why wouldnâ€™t I do it?â€

title: Facebook Announces New Design Changes, Massive Overhaul Coming In October
text:

â€œEffective October 1, 2014, Facebook users will experience a brand new appearance along with new formats and displays which will allow users to choose by various themes, colors, layouts, and fonts,â€ said Zuckerberg. â€œThese are features that are users have been requesting for years.Â Everyone will have the unique abilityÂ to arrange their profile pages in a custom setting, one of which is the original layout that included the â€œwallâ€ concept, which many members insisted was easier to navigate and maintain. You can organize your friends and post them on your pages. You can We want you to have the unrestricted freedom to choose what works best for you and your individual electronic devices.â€
Long time users of the site may remember the controversy surrounding the gradual change-over from Facebook Wall design to the current â€œTimelineâ€ layout. With that being said, we can assure, without a doubt Â that change is good and we believe 1.28 billion users will ultimately, enthusiastically agree on the first day of October. â€

title: Formula 1 Racer Decapitated After Violent Crash Flips Car
text:
â€œIt is with a heavy heart that we announce the passing of Felipe Massa in a crash during the Prix yesterday,â€ said Formula 1 representative Frederic Duerst. â€œMr. Massa was a phenomenal driver who unfortunately perished competing in a sport that he loved, that he lived for. We pass our deepest sympathies on to his family, friends, and the rest of his team at Williams Engineering.â€
Massa, who had grown up racing go-karts from the age of 8, became a world-class racer in his late teens, winning the European Grand Prix championship title when he was 19. He quickly worked his way up the ranks of racing, it finally being announced that he would join the Williams team alongside world-famous racer Valtteri Bottas.
The race, which was postponed for only a few hours following Massaâ€™s death so his body could be moved and car towed away, was overshadowed by theÂ horrific event. Teammate Bottas, who finished second in the race,Â was hoping for a victory.
â€œFelipe was one of the best drivers Iâ€™d ever seen, and he was a wonderful teammate and friend,â€ said Bottas. â€œHe joined us in November of last year, and had a great future ahead of him in this sport. Itâ€™s a sad day for us, and a sad day for racing fans everywhere. That being said, though, I kicked some aâ€“Â out there, huh? Second place? Iâ€™ll take it.â€
Fans in the stands were both saddened and excited by the crash.
â€œEveryone comes to these races to see a good crash,â€ said HansÂ Uhl, a fan who follows the Mercedes team. â€œThis crash was one of the most spectacular Iâ€™ve ever seen. Yes, a man was killed, but it was so cool to see [the car] flying through the air.â€
Williams Engineering has said that they have plans to look over the entire vehicle to ensure it was not mechanical malfunction that caused the crash.
â€œWe think it was just a bad day on the track,â€ said Williams Engineering spokesman David Black. â€œFormula 1 racing is a dangerous sport. They race in the worst-designed cars Iâ€™ve ever seen. Open tops, little restraints. Oh, and the helmets? My God, whatâ€™s the point? Iâ€™m surprised people arenâ€™t dying out there every race.â€
Massa will be interred at his home inÂ SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil. He was 33 years old.

title: New Law Will Make Practicing The Mormon Religion Illegal

Those people show up at 6:30AM!â€

title: Recently Paroled Child Killer: â€˜Itâ€™s The Childrenâ€™s Fault For How They Were Dressingâ€™
text:
Empire spoke to a recently-released child killer, who we will refer to as â€œJaredâ€, about what parents can do to ensure that their children are not even on a criminalâ€™s radar.
â€œYou already know how to educate your kids on stranger danger.â€ he said. â€œBut most of the time, telling your kids not to talk to a stranger isnâ€™t going to stop a potential pedophileÂ from snatching them. Put it this way, if a criminal sees something he desires, ainâ€™t nothing going to stop him if its what he really wants.
â€œWhat youâ€™ve gotta do, is stop dressing your children so goddâ€”Â trendy. Itâ€™s your fault, and the childrenâ€™s fault for how they are dressing!â€ explained Jared. â€œAll these kids prancing around in adult looking, fashionable clothing, theyâ€™re just begging for attention. Theyâ€™re begging to be snatched up, hurt, abused, and worse.â€
It is true that in recent years childrenâ€™s fashion has taken a surprising turn in regards to style and importance. Last year, London, England played host to the first ever Global Kids Fashion Week,Â Â where young children skipped down the catwalk in designer gear. Even more recently, Florence, Italy held the first annual Pitti Bimbo, a childrenswear trade show. Gone are the days where kids were simply dressed in t-shirts and jeans. Nowadays, even the top fashion labels out there have designer clothes for children to be seen in.
Freelance childrenâ€™s clothing designer Joanne Okes expressed her own concern about the direction of childrenâ€™s fashion.
â€œWhen you surround kids with such overwhelming consumerism, and you tell them that labels and clothing are crucial to their identity, you end up not with children, not with consumers, but with products. Stylishly dressed kids these days are becoming more and more a fashion accessory, and less like the children of a bygone era.â€
â€œWhen a criminal sees a stylishly dressed child, he sees an object, not a person, he sees a fashion accesory begging to be used.â€ Jaredâ€™s horrifying words almost mirroring Mrs Okes. â€œHe sees sex incarnate, the same as most men would in any model walking down the runway.â€
Whether or not how a child dresses is a factor into the dispicable crimes we unfortunately see so often, is debatable.
â€œItâ€™s ludicrous!â€ Said Jeanne Curtis, mother of two young girls.Â â€œThe idea that how my kids are dressed has anything to do with whether they will be abducted or not is just disgusting. Itâ€™s not only an excuse for their evil behavior, but a poor one at that. If my children want to grow up to be the next Cindy Crawford or Sharon Stone, they are going to start young and become beautiful every day.â€
When asked about aÂ localÂ court trial involving 21-year-old Susan Bedow and her apparent rapist, the same parent responded, â€œWell, I donâ€™t know whether the guy is guilty or not, but if he did rape her, thatâ€™s completely different. I mean, wellâ€¦did you see the skimpy outfit she was wearing on TV? That [expletive]Â was asking for it!â€

title: Body Of Osama Bin Laden Found By Deep Sea Fisherman
text:
According to the fisherman, he discovered the body about 8 miles off the coast of his hometown of Pasni, Pakistan. Bin Laden was pulled from an area of ocean where the depth is only about 75 meters. His body was well wrapped in a clear plastic tarp, and then tied up in a white cloth. Despite Bin Ladenâ€™s body having been disposed of in the ocean 3 years ago, his corpse was reportedly in near-immaculate condition, possibly preserved by the salt water and plastic wrapping.
â€œI was scared at first, finding a body.â€ Said the fisherman in an interview with his local newspaper. â€œI pulled it onto the ship, and I was astonished and amazed. I never in a million years thought I would find not only a body, but the body of Bin Laden. I was so excited â€“ I plan to make a lot of money off this!â€
Representatives for the US Government say it is impossible that anyone has recovered Bin Ladenâ€™s body.
â€œThere is no way that he was found in the ocean near Pakistan, or any ocean for that matter. The odds of that are exactly zero, and I refuse to say how I know that, except to say that I justâ€¦know.â€ Said Cpt. Issac Hillum, a spokesman for the US Army. â€œA body off the coast of Pakistan? Entirely believable. The government kills people and disposes of their useless corpses by â€˜burial at seaâ€™ almost on a daily basis. But Osama Bin Laden? No, Iâ€™m sorry. Itâ€™s literally impossible.â€
Several high-ranking members of the Taliban have a decidedly different opinion on the matter, and say that the US is denying that Bin Ladenâ€™s body has been discovered to hide traces of torture inflicted on him before and after his death.
â€œWe have seen the photos, we know it is our leader.â€ Said Anam SammerÂ G. Hadd, current leader of the Taliban forces in Pakistan. â€œWe are prepared to pay to retrieve the body and give it a proper burial. We will stop at nothing to make sure his body is returned to us. That is a warning you had better heed.â€
With each side having conflicting opinions on the identity of the body pulled from the ocean, the last word will rest in the hands of the man who is in possession of him.
â€œI know who it is. I am not blind. The photos are proof, and now the world will know. If the US doesnâ€™t want his body, then I will sell to the Taliban. Or I will sell to a private citizen anywhere in the world. What they do with it, I donâ€™t care to know. The first person who hits my asking price will be given his body. â€ Said the fisherman.
Currently, that asking priceÂ is $5 million USD. President Obama refused to comment on the possibility of it being Osama Bin Laden, or whether they would purchase the body if testing proved positively that it was.
Â

title: Texas Cheerleader And Internet-Famed Hunter Kendall Jones Mauled By Leopard In South Africa
text:
Kendall had been on vacation in South Africa with her parents. Â They had made several stops in Africa before arriving at the Kruger National Park to hunt.
According to eyewitnesses, Kendall was loading equipment into a truck when she attacked by a leopard that was able to sneak up on the group unnoticed. A guide that was travelling with Jones was able to shoot the leopard before it inflicted severe damage.
â€œThe leopard came out of nowhere and went straight for Kendall as if it was on a mission,â€ saidÂ Mehleli Ndlovu, a South African wildlife guide. Â â€œShe just dropped to the ground and started screaming about how she would never hunt again. Â It was very odd. Â I was able to shoot the leopard quickly. Â It only got a couple scratches on her but she was crying like she was going to die and insisted that we get her to a hospital.â€
Kendall received several lacerations to one leg. Â She was airlifted to theÂ Nelspruit Medi-Clinic where she received stitches to one wound on her upper leg and was released shortly after.

title: Man Gets Beaten Up After Posting Video Of Himself Hitting Dog To Internet
text:
This video was since removed from Facebook, however the video instantly went viral, attracting the attention of one man who decided to bring this little dog justice by tracking down HÃ¼sch and inflicting the same pain to him that HÃ¼sch inflicted on the poor, defenseless animal.


The guy also took a video of himself beating up HÃ¼sch, which he later posted online as a warning to everyone that animal cruelty and abuse would not be tolerated in Germany.
HÃ¼schâ€™s attacker was later identified as Josef Guldschmitt. Guldschmitt explained his attack in a interview by phone this evening.

title: New NRA-Backed Bill To Place 3 Day Waiting Period on Becoming Mentally Ill
text:
The bill would introduce a procedure whereby any American seeking to become mentally ill would have to announce their intentions to local law enforcement. From the time of their decision, citizens would then have to wait a full 72 hours before actually becoming mentally ill, giving law enforcement and local support systems plenty of time to prepare to deal with the issue.
Representative Wilson says this bill could help prevent most, if not all, of the gun violence which has plagued our nation for years.
â€œWeâ€™ve known for a while now that America has a mental health problem disguised as a gun problem.â€ Said Wilson. â€œWell, itâ€™s time we start taking concrete steps to help fix this.â€
Later in the press conference, Wilson elaborated on the reasoning behind the bill, saying that people need to better understand the impact that becoming mentally ill can have on their lives.
â€œThis waiting period might not be the perfect solution, but I think forcing people to sit and really think about whether or not they want to become mentally ill could help a lot of folks.â€ Said Wilson.
NRA President Wayne LaPierre has thrown the full weight of the NRA behind the bill already. In a written statement to the press, LaPierre said that this was an important step towards preventing future gun violence in this country.
â€œIt would be too difficult and expensive to attempt to regulate guns through legislation, so we must begin to regulate mental illness.â€ Said LaPierre. â€œItâ€™s time to start keeping mental illness out of the hands of people who could cause harm with it.â€
Not everyone is excited about the new effort to impose regulation on mental illness, though. Eric Fontaine, a mental illness rights activist, says that the government has no business coming between a person and any mental illness they might want. Fontaine says the bill, â€œâ€¦ would place an undue restriction on my ability to become mentally ill. What if Iâ€™m at a mental illness show and I decide I want to come down with schizophrenia right away? I shouldnâ€™t need to get the government involved in that transaction, I should just be able to decide to hear voices and then start hearing them right away.â€
â€œBesides,â€ Fontaine added, â€œMost mentally ill people are law abiding citizens. It doesnâ€™t make sense to punish all of us just because of a few bad apples.â€
While the bill would be a major step forward for mental illness regulation, some are already complaining that Congress must do more. Steve Winthrop, a mental illness regulation advocate, saidÂ that he wants aÂ universal background check for anyone seeking to become mentally ill.
â€œWe need to make sure that the people becoming mentally ill arenâ€™t convicted felons, violent offenders or, even worse, mentally ill.â€ Said Winthrop.

title: Discovery Channel Preps For â€˜Shark Week,â€™ Insists They Will Have New Information This Year
text:
Shark Week ads currently running on the channel all play up the same angle. One 30 second spot simply shows footage of a swimming shark while Discovery Channel regular and Shark Week 2014 host Mike Rowe says:
â€œWeâ€™ve known about these mighty sea beasts since the dawn of time. But this year, we might finally have them figured out.â€
Itâ€™s important to note that not even the Discovery Channel is claiming that sharks themselves have changed substantially in the past year. Indeed, sources close toÂ sharks tellÂ Empire News that, while individual sharks may have been born orÂ died in the past year, the sharks as a species have not changed substantially in several centuries.
Discovery Channel CEO David Zaslav said in a press conference earlier this week that he was excited to get to report all the developments in the human-shark relationship to viewers each summer. Says Zaslav, â€œPeople are learning new things about sharks every day. And the public at large relies on us to bring them that information once per year in a grand celebration of knowledge. Sure, they could just keep up with any new shark information as it comes out just by usingÂ a few Yahoo!Â News alerts, but why go through all the trouble?â€
In the same conference, Zaslav responded to critics of Shark Week, who have recently begun to allege that the week of programming is not educational at all, but simply an almost voyeuristic celebration of stories of swimmers being maimed, secretly aired under the guise of learning. Zaslav says this claim couldnâ€™t be further from the truth but that â€œFor the record, we will be telling all the gory details of every shark attack that took place in the past year. For learning, though, not for fun.â€
Empire News was able to speak to Roger Finn, a shark currently living off the cost of Australia. Mr. Finn had not been aware of Discovery Channelâ€™s Shark Week until we spoke to him, but once he became informed he had some strong views on the subject.
â€œIs this a joke? No, there isnâ€™t new stuff to cover about sharks every year.â€ Said Finn. â€œI mean sure, we have a vibrant culture and we do lots of things with each other, but it sounds to me like all these programs are just about times that we tried to eat people, and that process really hasnâ€™t changed in millennia.â€
Zasalav claims that they really do try to incorporate at least one new fact every year duringÂ Shark Week.Â He says this yearÂ scientists had discovered that the long-held belief that women who were menstruating should not swim near sharks was really just an old wivesâ€™ tale.
â€œAs our research team has discovered, even sharks have no interest in eating a woman who is on her period.â€ Said Zasalav.
â€œNot for nothing, but why exactly are you singling us out here?â€ Asked Finn. â€œYou know, lots of other animals kill more people than sharks. Cows, for example. Cows kill more of you than we do. Mosquitoes? Theyâ€™re like the #1 human killer of all time. I really canâ€™t help but feel like you guys are really being jerks about this. Itâ€™s almost racist.â€

title: Pope Francis Shocks The World By Opening Vatican City To Area Homeless
text:
No stranger to culture-shocking, Pope Francis added that, in edition to the Vatican being open for anyone who needed shelter, he would personally guarantee food, fresh water, and bathing facilities to anyone who needed it. He even offered privacy beds for homeless married couples who have not have the chance to copulate while living in squalor in the surrounding cities.
Unsurprisingly, this latest announcement of a Holy Man who seems intent on turning the Roman Catholic Church on its head has caused several uproars among other priests and every-day Catholics, many of whom eschew the Pontiffâ€™s modern theories in favor of their religious and dogmatic dark ages-style of worship.
One source tells us that although there are some in the Vatican who are for changing the socio-political environment of todayâ€™s society, they are not necessarily on board with being forced to house down-on-their-luck homeless if confronted by one outside their front doors.
â€œThis is exactly the kind of event which highlights to the world the difference between corruption-hijacking beliefs and true spirituality.â€ Noted one religious commentator who wished to remain anonymous. â€œThey [the church] arenâ€™t giving us a choice. If we live here, then we are required to just step aside and let dirty, possibly diseased, and desperate people into our homes. I will not complain publicly, but I am not happy.â€
As far as Pope Francis is concerned, people understand the changes he is trying to make.
â€œMy aim is to be as Christ-like as I can. To heal the sick, feed the poor, take care of the orphans and widows, and preach good news that God is reconciled with mankind.â€ Said Pope Francis to a Roman newspaper last week. â€œI open up my home to those without homes, in hopes of fulfilling this very thing. There is no agenda here. Whether they are Roman-Catholic or not, all are welcome to stay without needing to give anything back in return.â€
â€œIâ€™m surprised,â€ said one believer when we spoke to them about the recent turn of events, â€œand I am disappointed. I hoped that his Holiness would have had more of an understanding of the importance of tradition. Instead he is completely disregarding it in almost any way he can.â€
Pope Francis previously has made news headlines for his comparatively inclusive statements about the LGBTQ community as well as allegedly sneaking out of the Vatican in disguise at night to pray with the homeless people he cares so deeply for.

title: Google Looks To Buy MySpace, Livejournal, Plans To Combine Them With Google+
text:
â€œWhen we launched Google+ a few years back, we had plans on it becoming bigger than any social media site ever.â€ Said Larry Page, CEO of Google, INC. â€œWhat we failed to realize is that even though we have the biggest website in the world, with more traffic than anyone else, we just arenâ€™tÂ cool enough to get people to want to switch over from Facebook.â€
Although many people jumped immediately onto the Google+ bandwagon, the company found there was little they could do to steer people away from mega-giant social media website Facebook. In fact, so few people actually used their Google+ accounts, that Google decided to force people into using it by combining YouTube with their G+ services, something that didnâ€™t sit well with most YouTube users.
â€œNo one uses Google+, and no one wants to use Google+.â€ Said YouTube commenter â€˜BuzzsGirlfriendWoof.â€™ â€œWhy do I want to have to leave Facebook and go to another site, just to add everyone all over again over there? What a pain in the [expletive].
â€œWe probably came to the game way, way too late.â€ AgreedÂ Page. â€œSo weâ€™re trying something new, again, and this strategy is a surefire way to get people away from â€˜big blue,â€™ as we call them. All these old websites that no one visits anymore â€“ weâ€™re going to make them hip and cool again.â€
Page went on to explain that their plan is to purchase MySpace, LiveJournal, Friendster, DeviantArt, and AOL Instant Messenger, and combine them all into one giant, multi-purpose free-for-all of a social media website calledÂ ClusterFudge,Â with plans to have it be featured when you visit any of the old URLs, or the existing Google+ page.
â€œClusterFudge isÂ going to be incredible, seriously.â€ Said Page during a recent press conference. â€œYou will have our already sleekÂ Google+ website interface, but we will be adding in the features of all the other websites, including blogging and writing notes like LiveJournal, and adding your artwork and photos like DeviantArt. We also are super excited to be able to introduce a great chat feature with the purchase of AOL Instant Messenger from AOL.com.â€
When it was pointed out to him during the conference that Facebook already does all of those things, Page brushed off the comment, saying that â€œthey werenâ€™t interested in the dealings of a competitor.â€
â€œWe just want to shake up your oldÂ memories with this website. Youâ€™ll have a top 8 again! Donâ€™t you remember how cool that was? Weâ€™re even getting Tom to be your first friend just like old times!â€ Said Page.
The new website is currently being built by Google teams, in conjunction with several designers and engineers behind the other websites theyâ€™re looking to purchase. So far, no deals have been signed, but the purchase of these old, mostly dead and completely non-trafficed sites is said to be somewhere in the nature of only about $50,000.
Â

title: Bill Clinton Hits Talk Show Circuit to Promote New Book of White House Themed Erotica
text:
The former presidentÂ took to the airways to promote his Â book, simply titled Hard, which follows the exploits of a main character named â€œPresident Stiff Poundstone,â€ who takes part in an increasingly bizarre series of sexual encounters in-between presidential events.
Former President Clinton has remained cagey on the question of whether President Poundstone is entirely fictional, though he has hinted that parts of the story are based on his own time in the White House. In an interview with Robin Roberts on â€œGood Morning America,â€ Clinton explained that â€œIn chapter 6, where President Poundstone makes sweet love to the sexy brunette head of the Federal Reserve in exchange for taking $360 billion off of the federal debt? Well, thatâ€™s partly true, I really did reduce the federal debt by that much.â€
Indeed, some have speculated that former President Clinton wants Hard to, in part, be his way of rewriting the history of his Presidency. Those who subscribe to this belief point to the books tenth chapter, where the media accuse President Poundstone of having sex with an intern. In Mr. Clintonâ€™s presidency, such an accusation lead to an eventual impeachment trial. In Clintonâ€™s new book, however, President Poundstone simply admits to the affair and, to quote the text, â€œâ€¦ Everyone agreed that it was an awesome thing to do, and all the media high-fived the President asÂ they shotgunned Pabst Blue Ribbon beer together.â€
Hardâ€™s extremely adult subject matter and coarse language meant that Clinton was precluded from reading any large sections of it during his appearances. Instead, the former President was forced to merely summarize parts of the book, hoping to entice readers with his descriptions.
On â€œCBS Sunday Morning,â€ Clinton told Charles Osgood that â€œIn chapter three, President Poundstone has to entertain the hot blonde twin Polish ambassadors in order to prevent ruining a state dinner. Things get really steamy when a lobster escapes from a pot of boiling water and joins the fun. Itâ€™s one of my favorite chapters- hell Iâ€™m getting a chubby just thinking about it.â€
Most of Mr. Clintonâ€™s public appearances promoting the book have been solo, but he was accompanied by Hilary during a segment on Morning Joe with Joe Scarborough. During the interview, Mr. Clinton was engaged and egarly answered all of Scarboroughâ€™s questions, while Hilary kept her head buried in her hands, only occasionally looking up to stare angrily at her husband and ask â€œWhy canâ€™t I just have my own thing just this one time?â€

title: Michigan Woman Arrested For â€˜Eating Too Provocativelyâ€™
text:
â€œI was just minding my business, eating my lunch, and all of the sudden I was being treated like a criminal, of the worst kind! A perverted criminal!â€ Said Katherine, who says she was wearing slacks and a button down blouse at the time of her arrest. â€œI just canâ€™t believe this is happening to me. I mean â€“ how can this be right? I have to find a lawyer, and go through a whole process. For what? For not covering my hair?â€
In a bizarre situation like this, one can see how prevalent the Arab influenceÂ isÂ in the city, especially in East Dearborn, where many of the local shops have signs written in both English and Arabic. With mostÂ businesses catering to the Arab population,Â it becomes more clear why Murphy stuck out like a sore thumb.
TheÂ officersÂ arrested Murphy, citing complaints theyÂ claimed to have received about â€˜a woman who was eating a shawarma in a provocative manner while exposing herself to the public.â€™ Murphy, who was rightfully outraged, was very vocal in her opposition of what she says was a â€˜pathetic abuse of power.â€™
â€œAll of the women around me were wearing hijabs, but I wasnâ€™t. Iâ€™m not Muslim. I respect that their culture, but I donâ€™t think I should have partake to just because I want to eat lunch. And not wearing one certainly doesnâ€™t mean I was exposing myself!â€
Modesty is a virtue valued in the Muslim community. Many women choose to cover their bodies, baring minimal to no skin, sometimes showing only the eyes, feet and hands. They rarelyÂ expose more than this to anyone beyond close relatives, to prevent a man they may marry from seeing what they look like. A hijab is a traditional scarf women wear to cover their hair, and sometimes face.
Abdullah Mouawad, Murphyâ€™s coworker, takes her side on this issue.
â€œI donâ€™t think she was eating provocatively on purpose, Katherineâ€™s just a very attractive womanÂ andÂ she canâ€™t help that aÂ shawarma is so phallic in nature.â€ says Mouawad. â€œPolice corruption of power is out of control in this city. They told her that her hair should be covered and there were plenty of places where she could buy a hijab to do so. I feel really bad because we had never been to that restaurant and it was my suggestion. I donâ€™t even know how to help her now.â€
MurphyÂ was arrested and charged with Misdemeanor Indecent Exposure and was release on $2,000 bail while she awaits trial.
â€œI donâ€™t believe I did anything wrong, but Iâ€™m still really nervous. I could be put on the sex offenders list!â€ Murphy said, although, she hasnâ€™t let this ordeal curb her appetite for exotic cuisine. â€œIâ€™ve had two shawarmaâ€™s since, but now I just have my husband pick up carry-out.â€
The two officers who arrested Murphy and their superiors refused comment for this article.

title: Westboro Baptist Church Members Now Claiming â€˜God Hates Jesusâ€™
text:
According to the Shirley Phelps-Roper, one of the head members of the church, Heaven is a relatively empty place, reserved exclusively for the dwindling Phelps brood, dumpster kittens, and aborted babies, while the majority of people are sent to HellÂ for an eternal damnation.Â  While mostÂ consider WestboroÂ a hate-group (they are banned from both Canada and the UK because of their protests), the Phelps family feels they are the authority on God.
Since 1991, The Westboro Baptist Church has earned themselves scores of bad publicity, protesting funerals of fallen soldiers, bullied suicide victims, and more. Signs that readÂ â€œGod Hates Fag-Enablersâ€Â andÂ â€œThank God For Dead Soldiersâ€ are often held by members of the church during their pickets.Â While they have said they consider the American people the worst abomination in the eyes of the Lord, the second biggest offender is Godâ€™s only begotten son, Jesus.
According to the family, since his death in March of Â 2014, Fred Phelps has appeared in the dreams of multiple members, communicating from beyond the grave, telling them of Godâ€™s hate forÂ Jesus.
â€œHeâ€™s a fag-enabling pansy. God Hates Jesus, and the only thing the Father regrets more than impregnating Mary is creating humanity in the first place.â€œ Said Phelps to several of his granddaughters through their dreams.
â€œWe certainly wonâ€™t stop delivering Godâ€™s Message.â€ Said Phelps-Roper. â€œGod has always hated the fags and the fag-enablers of this country. What we didnâ€™t know until my father came to usÂ was that he hates his only son even more.â€
According to the membersâ€™ dreams, God and Jesus have been at odds over humanity for some time. While God prefers the fire and brimstone approach, Jesus is all peace and love.
When reached for comment about their new mission, Phelps-Roper screamed over everybody, repeating her rehearsed dogma, while avoiding actually answering any questions.
â€œNathum 1:2, â€˜The Lord is a jealous and avenging God; the Lord is avenging and wrathful.'â€ Said Phelps-Roper,Â a self-righteous smile on her face and a chorus of Westboro children chanting Jesus-Lovers Will Burn In Gay HellÂ behind her. â€œWhen judgement day comes, God is certainly not going to â€˜turn the other cheek.'â€
On July 4th, Independence Day, the Westboro Baptist Church areÂ preparing a picket of the annual fireworks show at the White House in Washington, D.C., prepared to show the world their new chosen path against Jesus and His followers.
â€œJust because [Fred Phelps] has passedÂ on doesnâ€™t mean we will stop spreading the Gospel,â€ Phelps-RoperÂ insisted. â€œWe are hand-chosen by God to deliver this message. You have the choice to listen and repent, or perish and burn for an eternity in Hell.â€

title: Police Officer Suspended After Putting 3-Year-Old Toddler In Handcuffs
text:
JenniferÂ GoldsmithÂ says that when officer Mark Deville showed up at her house after she called forÂ police assistance, he immediately scolded her crying son, Joey, telling him to â€œshut the fuckÂ up.â€ When Joey wouldnâ€™t stop fussing, Deville allegedly handcuffed the child behind his back, picked him up, and brought him to his police cruiser.
Joey was left in the car for only about 10 minutes before Deville let him out, but Goldsmith says that her son was just upset because of a fight she had with her husband, Joseph Sr., and that heÂ was scared because there was lots of yelling. According to police reports, the coupleÂ had physically hit each other several times, and had thrown pieces of furniture and empty liquor bottles across the room. Their young child was in the room the entire time.
â€œMy husband and I may have been having some problems that upset my son, but that doesnâ€™t excuse the actions that Officer Deville, or Officer Devil as we call him, took with my son,â€ Said Goldsmith. â€œHe should be ashamed of himself for beratingÂ a small child, and treating him like a criminal. We are planning to sue the asses off him and the entire police department. No one handcuffs my child or tells him to â€˜shut the fuck upâ€™ except for me or his father.â€
AfterÂ the story broke in a local newspaper,Â The CovingtonÂ Herald, on Wednesday of this week,Â police chief Michael Horgan immediately suspended Deville while they look to investigate his actions.
â€œOfficer Deville is a decorated marine, who has been on our police force for over two decades,â€ Said Chief Horgan. â€œHeâ€™s only had 6 or 7 complaints of brutality in that time period, and only 2 other suspensions for complaints against him, which is the fewest of any of the officers under my command. I will be investigating the matter personally, but I can tell you right now that even if [Mark] did handcuff the kid, the boyÂ probably deserved it. Kids are a real pain in the ass sometimes, ya know?â€
â€œSome kids, they just need a stern hand,â€ Said Deville when questioned about the incident. â€œObviously his parents couldnâ€™tÂ handle him,Â so yeah, I put him in my cruiser.Â I didnâ€™t use the zipties on him or anything for crying out loud. I just used regular old fashioned handcuffs, and the kid slipped out of them in about two seconds because he has tiny toddler wrists. Thatâ€™s the reason I ended up bringing him to my car. Incidentally, he stopped crying while he was out there. Probably because he didnâ€™t have to look at his momâ€™s bitch face anymore.â€
Both parents were arrested for domestic battery that evening, and their son spent the night with his grandmother.
Representatives at theÂ Policemenâ€™s Benevolent Association, the union that represents Deville, had no comment on the case. Deville himself is scheduled to appear before the policemanâ€™s board on Monday to explain and defend his actions.

title: North Korea Plans Missile Attack On U.S. Over Seth Rogen Comedy
text:
â€œThis movie is obviously satire.â€ Rogen states, laughing hysterically. Â â€œBut Kim, he wants to literally attack the country if we release it. He wants us dead. The fact that this crazy dude believes that we want to kill him is absolutely hilarious, and just proves how off his rocker this dude is.â€

North Korean leaders have seen the trailer for this film, and are not impressed. We donâ€™t exactly make bank there anyway.â€
The US Defense department has said that there is no reason to worry, and more than likely North Korea isÂ just engaging in a metaphorical â€œdick-waggingâ€ contest.

title: Fast Food Chains Brace For Onslaught Of Fake â€˜Sympathy Storiesâ€™ By Parents Of Disfigured Children
text:
When that story proved to be completely false, made up by the family of the young girl to gain sympathy and money for her surgeries, other fast food chains buckled down, preparing for an onslaught of fake stories created by parents of ugly or disfigured children.

We canâ€™t take any chances, here.â€
KFC Corporation had initially offered to donate $30,000 toÂ Victoria Wilcher, the young girl who was reportedly asked to leave their restaurant, to help pay for her rapidly rising medical costs. When news broke that Wilcherâ€™s grandmother, Kelly Mullins, had fabricated the story, KFC actually stood by their offer, something otherÂ companies might have never done.
â€œWe offered her the money, weâ€™re not going to take it back now.â€ Said Harland Sanders, president of KFC Corporation. â€œI mean, if the familyÂ wants to not take the money now that the world knows theyâ€™re complete liars, then thatâ€™s up to them.â€
â€œThat story went viral, and before they knew what hit them, KFC was giving away thousands of dollars. Itâ€™s now been proven that [the family] completelyÂ made up the story.â€ Said Dave Thomas, president of Wendyâ€™s Restaurants. â€œAre they bad people for trying to scam a multi-billion dollar corporation? Well, thatâ€™s for everyone else and KFC to decide, not me. Iâ€™m not the one handing over thirty grand.â€
Several fast food chains have already gone on record asÂ saying that they will not be giving a cent to anyone, no matter how severe their fake claims are, or how hard they tug on the heartstrings of a gullible public, without proper research into any allegations.
â€œI donâ€™t care if someone says we dragged a kid with no legs out of his wheelchair and pelted him with chicken nuggets,â€ said Kroc. â€œWeâ€™re not even giving the kid a free Happy Meal until weâ€™ve investigated the matter internally.â€
In this sue-happy, complaint-riddled world, itâ€™s not just restaurants that need to be worried about these fake â€˜sympathy stories.â€™ The entire retail world is shaking where they stand, readying themselves to be sued for anything from an offensive TV commercial to a store employee with badÂ breath.
â€œWeâ€™ve had so many complaints over the years, so many stories made up about us, I canâ€™t keep track of them all.â€ Said Sanders. â€œWe use rats instead of chicken, that our chickens are mutants, that we support the KKKâ€¦weâ€™ve had them all. You know what, though? Weâ€™re still here, still clucking right along.â€
So far, no comments have been made publicly by Victoriaâ€™s family,Â but their Facebook page, which was set up to help raise money for Victoriaâ€™s medical bills and was the page that originally posted the allegations against KFC, was removed on Tuesday afternoon.

title: Oprah Posts Bail For â€˜Sexy Felonâ€™ Jeremy Meeks
text:
Apparently all the attention Meeks has gotten since being arrested has only helped him, as billionaire actress and media mogul Oprah Winfrey has reportedly agreed to pay Meeksâ€™ $900,000 bail, with the intent of giving him a job as a talk show host on her OWN Network.
â€œJeremy is so beautiful. Heâ€™s really one of the most gorgeous men Iâ€™ve ever seen.â€ Said Winfrey. â€œI saw his picture while I was checking my Twitter, and my heart skipped a beat. He is practically the definition of the word â€˜sexyâ€™.â€
Meeks has said he will gladly take the offer of hosting his own program, as it has always been his dream to get out of arms dealing and move into the entertainment world. He is reportedly working with Winfrey, her producers, and a group of writers to determine the best kind of show for his â€˜style.â€™
â€œI am not a doctor, so I guess I canâ€™t really be Dr. Phil or anything.â€ Said Meeks. â€œWhat Iâ€™ve suggested is a milder version of a Jerry Springer, where my guests are mostly cons and criminals like me, and I can maybe help them get or stay on the straight-and-narrow.â€
Winfrey may not be looking just to have a new face for her network, though. Possible troubled waters with Winfrey and longtime partner Stedman Graham mean that itâ€™s always possible that Winfrey is looking towards a future with a younger, more handsome beau.
â€œOh gosh, thatâ€™s just not true.â€ Said Winfrey, giggling like a school girl. â€œI really just want for Jeremy to find a better life. Heâ€™s got a beautiful girl and a family already. He certainly doesnâ€™t need me or my billions of dollars to hang onto.â€
For now, Meeks has said he just wants to get his life back on track, and is extremely thankful that he is being given this opportunity.
â€œI never thought that becoming an internet meme would parlay into a career.â€ Said Meeks. â€œThis is truly the best thing I could have ever hoped for.â€
MeeksÂ is scheduled to be back in court next week.

title: Cops Crack Down on Teens Abstract Expressionist Painting While Driving
text:
The program involves PSAâ€™s, training for officers on how to spot painters in their cars, as well as special checkpoints along major highways where officers will be able to arrest anyone refusing to follow the rules of traditional composition.
Abstract expressionism while driving has been on the rise in recent years, and some say has only gotten worse ever since teen clothier Urban Outfitters began selling â€œTo-goâ€ sized canvasses and mini paint buckets that fit in a carâ€™s cup-holder. A recent survey by ABC News found that over 40% of young adults (ages 16-25) admit to abstract expressionist painting while driving, with 20% saying they create a mind-bending work of pure exploration every single time they get behind the wheel.
Philadelphia Police Chief Charles Ramsey was instrumental in creating this new initiative. He says he first became passionate about this issue after a series of accidents in his home city.
â€œThese young people, most of them teenagers, had gotten in to wrecks because they were distracted, applying paint to canvass in non-representational ways and trying to push the limits of what paint can express when they should be keeping their eyes on the road.â€ Said Ramsey. â€œI hope this program will help keep more people focused, and remind drivers that they can always explore two-dimensional reality after they get wherever theyâ€™re going.â€
Empire News spoke to one teenager, Louis, who says that he started abstract expressionist painting while driving almost as soon as he got his license. Says Louis, â€œItâ€™s not as big a deal as some people make it out to be. If you know what youâ€™re doing, youâ€™ll be fine. Like me, I only paint when Iâ€™m stopped at a red lightâ€¦ mostly because red lights are the inspiration for all my work. I try to create a visual mÃ©lange which evokes the red light without using the color red.â€
According to existing distracted-driver laws, though, Louis is a criminal. Any police officer who catches him paining while driving is within their rights to arrest him. In most jurisdictions, abstract expressionist painting while driving carries a penalty of up to $500, and one scathing review of the painting in question by a magazine or newspaper of record.
Some outside of law enforcement have alleged that the crackdown on abstract expressionist painting while driving is unfairly targeted at young people. Studies have shown that those above the age of 40 tend to avoid abstract expressionism, but that 43% of them landscape or portrait paint while driving, and 37% of them compose classical epic poetry while behind the wheel.

title: YouTube-Famous Daredevil Vitaly Raskalov Injured In Freak Accident
text:
â€œItâ€™s really silly, honestly.â€ Said Raskalov from his hospital bed. â€œBut ya know, It happens to people all the time, doesnâ€™t it? Why canâ€™t it happen to me?â€
There is a level of irony at Raskalovâ€™s injury, as he has traveled the world risking life and limb climbing skyscrapers, buildings, and even the pyramids of Egypt.
Raskalov first rose to prominence as his YouTube videos showed him hanging from ledges hundreds of feet above the ground, walking along the rails of an abandoned roller coaster in Japan, or sneaking past security guards to gain access to restricted buildings. His extreme stunts have gotten him arrested and banned from multiple countries, including Egypt for the pyramid climb, and Russia for multiple stunts.
Doctors say that Raskalov will be back illegally climbing buildings by the end of the summer, assuming his shoulder heals properly. Thankfully, they say, he is in such great athletic shape, that his physical therapy should be minimal.
â€œThis is an amazing kid, and what he does isâ€¦well, it makes me palms sweat when I see the videos.â€ Said Dr. Victor Marshen, Raskalovâ€™s doctor. â€œHeâ€™s truly talented, and probably just a little past crazy.â€
Raskalov has said that he still has several hours of video footage recorded, so his YouTube channel will continue to have new content, and that he plans on traveling to the US in the fall with hopes of climbing the Empire State building.

title: Las Vegas Bans EDM, Dubstep Music From Being Played In Public
text:
â€œWe may be known as Sin City to people around the world,â€ said Fretwell. â€œBut what we are not is tolerant of bad performances. This city has a history of outstanding music. The strip has been home to everyone from Frank Sinatra and Elton John, to Garth Brooks and Britney Spears. We love all types of music. That said, though, this so-called â€˜dubstepâ€™ and â€˜EDMâ€™ â€“ these are not musical genres. They are noise, and they are obnoxious. The people of Las Vegas donâ€™t want talentless hacks filling our casinos and nightclubs.â€
Fretwell said that the ban would have to be strictly enforced by all private casinos, or they would face fines.
â€œWe are pretty positive that the casinos and clubs of Las Vegas will abide by this new ban. Even if they donâ€™t, it will be so strictly monitored by the people who live in this city, a club would be stupid to book a show. Theyâ€™ll know that the city will tear them apart like a fat man eating at an all-you-can eat buffet.â€
â€œTo be honest, this wonâ€™t hurt our business at all.â€ Said Mark Tidwin, president of the Sands Casino on the strip in Las Vegas. â€œWe very rarely would book crap like that, so it isnâ€™t going to bother us that we can have that Skrilly guy here, or whatever his name is.â€
Las Vegas is the first city in the country to outright ban dubstep music, although many other cities have ordinances that only allow it to be played in areas where there are no homes or businesses. Decatur, Alalbama, for example, has a regulation that dubstep â€œcan only be played between the hours of 3pm and 5pm, and must be only played in an area where it cannot be heard by anyone within a 30 mile radius.â€
Opponents of the ban were hard to find, as most self-respecting people that were asked would not admit to listening to that type of music. Even one teenagerÂ in Las Vegas, who was wearing aÂ t-shirt for Deadmau5, a house music producer,Â denied listening to that type of music when questioned about the ban.
â€œI just like the design on this shirt. I got it on clearance at Hot Topic.â€ Said the teen. â€œDoes anyone actually like that garbage if theyâ€™re not on drugs? I mean hell, itâ€™s just a dude pressing buttons on his computer.â€
Fretwell says she is glad that the ban was passed with no push-back from the city council.
â€œItâ€™s a great day. I can go outside, and I can hear the drunks and the slot machines, the old folks and the high-rollers. Thank God, though, I donâ€™t have to hear any wub-wub.â€

title: Unborn Baby Becomes Pregnant While Still Inside The Womb
text:
Mary Lambert, who is 8 months pregnant, went to SilversteinÂ Memorial Hospital in Portland when she thought she might be going into labor. Doctors examined her, and initially could not figure out what was causing Lambertâ€™s pain. After an ultrasound to check on her baby, they were taken aback to find that her unborn daughter was also pregnant.
â€œI have never in my life seen anything like this.â€ Said Dr. Joseph Goldsmith, a pediatric surgeon at Silverstein. â€œI donâ€™t think anyone has. This is the first time that an unborn baby has become impregnated. Itâ€™s so far beyond rare that we didnâ€™t know it was possible.â€
Up until now, the youngest person to ever become pregnant wasÂ Lina Medina, a Peruvian girl who was just under 6 years old when she gave birth. Doctors were shocked at Medinaâ€™s diagnosis at the time, but it was later discovered that she hadÂ entered into Precocious puberty, which is a rare disorder that causes puberty in extremely young children. It wonâ€™t be possible to test Lambertâ€™s unborn daughter for Precocious puberty until she is born. Even if she is found to have the rare disorder, it will still make her the youngest person to ever become pregnant.
Lambert and her husband, Carl, are naturally very worried about the safety of their baby.
â€œDoctors told us it was safe to have sex while I was pregnant. Several of my girlfriends told me that they did, and there were no problems at all.â€ Said Lambert. â€œWe never thought this would happen. Carl is going to be a dad, and a grandpa all at once? I donâ€™t â€“ I mean, who can understand all this? I just worry that my baby wonâ€™t make it. Even if she does, Iâ€™m too young to be a grandmother.â€
Lambertâ€™s doctors say, unbelievably, that both babies seem to be very healthy. When Lambert gives birth to her baby next month, she will be about 6 months pregnant, and is looking at spending her first several months of life in the hospital as doctors determine how best to handle the situation.
â€œAt this point, we donâ€™t know whether Maryâ€™s daughter will survive if she continues to sustain another life inside her.â€ Said Goldsmith. â€œAll we know is that this is a very rare, very unusual case, and we are taking it day-by-day. So far, Mary and babies are doing fine.â€

title: Casey Anthony, George Zimmerman To Star In New Reality TV Show
text:
The show, which goes by the working title of Beat the System,Â is being developed by the Investigation Discovery network, and is set to air in the fall of 2014. It will be the first unscripted reality show developed by the ID Network.
The series will star Anthony and Zimmerman, who became friends in real life after they bonded over their recent brushes with the law, and their eventual acquittals of murder.
â€œI am so happy that Casey and I got offered this reality series.â€ Said Zimmerman, who was found not guilty for the murder of young teen Trayvon Martin. â€œWe are really excited to start filming next week in Miami.â€
Beat the SystemÂ is going to follow the everyday lives of Anthony and Zimmerman, to get an insight into what it is like after you are found not guiltyÂ of a crime that the entire world knows youâ€™ve committed. The ID Network is advertising it as a Kate Plus 8Â meets Unsolved Mysteries kind of show.
â€œGeorge and I became so close after his trial.â€ Said Anthony, who was acquitted of murdering her young daughter, Caylee. Â â€œI began writing to him during his ordeal, offering my support, because I went through the same thing. He wrote back, and we became good friends. Iâ€™m so excited for this series. I really want people to see that George and I are just regular people. We grocery shop, go to the movies, and party like everyone else.â€
After advertisements for the show hit television networks and YouTube, a backlash of emails began flooding the offices of the ID Network, demanding the show be cancelled before it even starts.
â€œHow dare anyone profit off these heinous crimes.â€ Said one angry viewer. â€œThese two pieces of filth should be behind bars, and everyone knows it. This show is a disgrace to TV, and I donâ€™t know anyone who will be watching it.â€
â€œThese two are famous. In fact, they are more than famous. Theyâ€™re infamous.â€Â Said Joe Goldsmith, president of the Investigation Discovery Network. â€œIt doesnâ€™t matter how they got to be famous. They are known faces, their backstories are known. What isnâ€™t known, though, is how they deal every day with the same basic things everyone has to. What itâ€™s like for them to be in public and be recognized. We are trying to put a humanitarian face on two people who are very misunderstood.â€
â€œItâ€™s the best thing to come out of all of this tragedy.â€ Said Anthony. â€œGeorge and I, weâ€™ve been through so much. Now we can put our pasts to rest and focus on this great new future, this great show.â€
Reportedly, an episode is also set to feature Anthony and Zimmerman visiting their mutual friend O.J. Simpson in prison. Simpson was acquitted of murdering his wife and friend almost 2 decades ago, but was recently sentenced to 32 years in prison for his part in an armed robbery.
â€œI wish that [Simpson] could have been a part of this show on a regular basis. Heâ€™s a great guy, and Casey and I owe so much to him.â€ Said Zimmerman. â€œI know that he would get a kick out of reality TV.â€
The ID Network reportedly stands to make more money off this show than almost all their other programming combined, with advertisers offering upwards of 3 and 4 times the normal rate for a standardÂ 30-second commercial spot during the show. Anthony and Zimmerman also stand to make a small fortune, as each are reportedly earning $100,000 per episode, with 13 episodes ordered for the initial fall/winter season.
